title: "Data Analysis - Template"
output: html_notebook

```{r setup}
remove(list = objects(all.names = TRUE)[!(objects(all.names = TRUE) %in% "template__RAW_DATA")])

library(showtext)
library(ggpubr)
library(rstatix)
library(zeallot)
library(magrittr)
library(tidyverse)

showtext::showtext_auto()
```

```{r source-scripts}
projectSource <- (function() {
	projectRoot <- rprojroot::find_rstudio_root_file()
	projectSource <- function(relativePath) {
		source(file.path(projectRoot, relativePath))
	}
	return(projectSource)
})()
projectSource("src/utilities/index.R")
```

```{r import-data}
dataList <- new.env()
list.files(
		file.path(template__PREPROCESSED_DATA_DIR),
		pattern = r"(.+\.RData$)",
		full.names = TRUE
	) %>%
		walk(~ load(., envir = dataList))
dataList <- as.list(dataList)
```
